features: 【Handheld Bidet Sprayer Kit Packing Included】This toilet bidet sprayer kit comes with all installation kit so you don't have to buy anything else. Including Bidet Sprayer, 4.92ft Hose, 7/8" T-valve, Hook Holder, Rubber O-ring（inside T-Valve）, Teflon Tappe，2 Screw and 2 Anchor, installation instruction. Just make sure that your toilet tank's water inlet diameter is 7/8".

【Jet Spray for Toilet - Better Personal Hygiene】The bidet for toilet is the best choice for bottom cleaning to improve personal hygiene,especially for women pregnancy and menstrual cycles. Hand Held Bidet Sprayer’s one-hand ergonomic design allows you easier to clean your front or back, which is more hygienic than using toilet paper. Especially for anyone with limited mobility due to surgery, arthritis, postpartum or injuries, ideal for elderly adults.

【Toilet Water Sprayer with Explosion-proof Hose】The upgraded hose features double protection. A high quality 304 stainless steel case. The inner tube adds a stainless steel braid, which can effectively prevent the hose from bursting. Make the hose more durable and lasts longer. One year warranty, if the hose bursts, you can contact us to replace a new hose for free.

【Bidet Sprayer for Toilet with Adjustable Jet Spray】It meets multiple use through adjusting water pressure of bidet sprayer from Gentle spray to jet spray. Gentle press mode for feminine bottom cleaning or baby bath or pet bath washing. Jet spray for rinsing floor or carpets or baby cloth diapers.

【Muslim Shower Toilet Sprayer with Two Installantion Methods】ON TOILET TANK INSTALLATION - Just hook bidet sprayer holder to your toilet tank, save your bathroom space and tools for drilling holes. WALL MOUNT INSTALLATION - Available to supply other multiple use according to your varies requirement, such as pet shower, car washer, flower sprayer, baby shower.
body.description: AIFUSI Cloth Diaper Sprayer We are committed to bringing you a great product! We have chosen to use top quality materials to create our diaper sprayer kit. The sprayer, hose and hanger are all made from stainless steel for a durable and sturdy product. Specifications: Color: Sliver Material: Stainless Steel Product Dimensions: 49 x 21.6 x 7.87 inches Item Weight: 1.47 pounds The Length of Hose: 59 inches Special Features: Horizontal Spray Usage: Bidet, Rinsing, Cleaning, Diaper Sprayer, Washing. Package Include: 1 X Bedit Sprayer 1 X Sprayer Holder 1 X T-Valve 1 X 4.9 FT Hose 1 X Plumbers Tape1 X Black Rubber Washer（inside T-Valve）2 Screw and 2 AnchorEASY INSTALLATION: 2 ways of installation, you can choose either to install it on the wall or hook it next to the toilet tank. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed Our customers are our number one priority and it is our intention to offer the BEST customer service on Amazon , which is why we make sure to deliver the best product possible. If you have any questions about our product, you can contact our friendly customer service team and we will reply you within 24 hours. If you are not delighted with your purchase, please feel free to contact us,we will refund your money within 30 days.

Specifications Name: AIFUSI Handheld Bidet Sprayer for Toilet Color: Sliver Material: Stainless Steel Product Dimensions: 49 x 21.6 x 7.87 inch Item Weight: 1.47 pounds The Length of Hose: 4.9 ft Special Features: Horizontal Spray Usage: Bidet, Rinsing, Cleaning, Diaper Sprayer, Washing, Feminine Hygiene

Can On Wall Or Hook Up To Tank 2 ways of installation, you can choose either to install it on the wall or hook it next to the toilet tank. 2 Water Pressure Modes The handheld bidet sprayer has 2 water pressure modes, Jet spray and Soft spray modes. Control the water pressure through handle bidet sprayer buttons to achieve more thorough cleanliness and bring you a healthier personal life. Water Pressure Adjustable You can adjust the pressure of the water stream with the lever on the T-valve for various uses of the sprayer. I mean, you wouldn’t want to jump up in surprise when using it as a bidet sprayer right? You will just need to adjust the knob to the desired level of water pressure. Just be sure to turn it off again once you are done!

Installation Instructions 1. Turn off water feed. 2. Disconnect toilet hose from flush tank. 3. Connect T-adapter to flush tank. 4. Connect toilet hose and shower hose to T-adapter as shown. 5. Connect other end of shower hose to sprayer. 6. Turn water feed back on. 7. Assemble hanger and mount (instructions on separate color insert).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From 1 star to 5. The bidet hose leaks like crazy from the spray wand
reviews.reviewText: I have installed my share of kitchen sinks, bath sinks, and toilets. I'm not a novice to plumbing. For the life of me I cannot get this spray wand to stop leaking. It really leaks. Must be a manufacturing defect. It's going back.Upgraded rating. Vendor sent a replacement very quickly. I will revisit rating after the new item is installed.The replacement is working great. Easy to install. I'm happy. Giving 5 stars for their customer care and responsiveness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Installs like any other. No issues or leaks, use teflon tape. If it leaks re-do it better, its likely not wrapped proper or got caught when you started connecting. Pressure is good, obviously can be adjusted. Many recommend turning it off after use, been using those things my entire life and never did, but I keep it set about a quarter to half way open so its not pumping max all time, no real need for that anyway. It helps if you want to rinse the tub, tiles if you don't have a hose connected shower head. Though, these don't last forever. A year, two and expect to have leaks when spraying. I think its due to corrosion from the water and all, normal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good at first but broke twice and it is a design flaw
reviews.reviewText: We were happy with the product at first (we actually had two ordered for both our bathrooms). However, we had three random leaks from the head (sprayer part) that if we had not caught them early , would have turned into serious flooding accidents. After disassembling the head, I learned the design is flawed. The only part keeping the sprayer valve closed so preventing water from leaking is a loaded spring that after a while and normal wearing is no longer able to keep the valve closed. On the other side, the only part keeping the sprayer button in place is a a thicker rubber washer that also can fail after some time. So the design is guaranteed to fail at the head and cause leaking sooner or later. Just a matter of time and luck....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money 💰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Attachment, Lasted 2.5 years
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. We didn’t use it as a bidet, we used it as a cloth diaper sprayer. It is very easy to attach to your toilet and has a pretty long hose so we used it to spray out our bathtub anytime babies had accidents in the tub or we had to wash the dog. Needless to say this sprayer got a lot of use. That’s probably why it only lasted 2.5 year, which for $25 is pretty awesome. The hose began to leak and is leaving pools of water on our bathroom floor. Other than that it was great, just ordered a brand new one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will rip you a new hole if you're not careful
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's actually a really great bidet and now that I've gotten used to it I do like the power it does offer. I have a lot of animals in my house so sometimes I'll put something over the toilet and spray it out with the bidet sprayer also the bidet sprayer doesn't have an aerator on it so it sprays out faster than any other sink in my house that has a restricted aerator.I will say there is a point where it seems to just go from slowly increasing pressure and water pressure to all the sudden it's pretty much full blast. I did include a video where you can see that kind of tipping point area while you're pressing on the lever.Also during winter it's still freezing cold water has this is just cold water there are some heat tapes that you could probably put around the base or along the water line. But I've gotten used to it it's really not that big of a deal but the first time you spray yourself with a cold full blast oh yeah it'll make you regret ever installing this 🤣Still it saved me a ton on toilet paper many people may still use toilet paper to just dab themselves dry I literally just sit on the toilet a little bit longer and started pulling my pants up even with me being a little water wet. It doesn't cause any adverse effects no rashes no yeast infection or anything. As you've actually cleaned yourself off! I have not had this for over a month and feel confident giving it five stars though I do wish there was maybe some dial somewhere that I could adjust the max pressure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2020
reviews.reviewText: We ordered 2 of these. 1 of them already had a leak and when we checked there was a hole in the hose, so we ordered a replacement. The exchange was great. We got the replacement the very next day. Both sprayers worked well and we were glad we made the purchase. Then (a couple months later), the hose in our master bathroom broke. My youngest son came running in the kitchen telling me there was water coming out of our toilet. I ran to our bathroom and water was just spraying out of the T-valve where the hose broke off. It wasn't just spilling out, it was spraying out like a pressure washer! I'm not sure how the hose broke-off from the T-valve, but I'm glad my youngest son heard the noise and told me early enough before it really flooded our bathroom. I wish I had taken a picture of the hose and valve. I was so upset having to clean up our bathroom I just tossed this stuff in the trash. So that's 2 out of 3 sprayers we received that was poorly made. I'm giving it 3 stars because we really enjoyed having it when it worked for us. We ended up buying a bio-bidet from Costco and I definitely prefer this one so we bought another one to replace the other sprayer that's currently working.

La calidad de la llave y conexiones está muy bien. Le doy 3 estrellas solo por que la manguera tenía una fuga de la cuál, me di cuenta luego de instalarla. Terminé comprando otra manguera de repuesto económica, ya que las mangueras para este uso, son más caras que este artículo. Todo lo demás, está excelente. Sí volvería a comprar otra a este proveedor.

Thank you for making a great product. It is lovely style, perfect side, the control response of the trigger, the softness re-flexible of the hose, easy connecting from water supply and the unbeatable price for this quality product.I highly recommend the Bidet Sprayer keyboard to family and friends.
Al principio muy bien, pero a los pocos meses de uso la manguera se ha roto, y fuga toda el agua.

reviews.reviewTitle: Incomplete parts included in the package
reviews.reviewText: The hand bidet sprayer is good. But the sent us incomplete pieces of the sprayer. The washer and nuts to attach holder and handle is missing in the package. So, I cant lift the sprayer in the tank nor I can stick in the wall mount.

La idea es buena, la instalé para poder llenar cubetas de agua en la parte alta sin tener que estar bajando al patio. Lo malo es que la manguera no resistió la alta presión y ahora se sale por todos lados. No aguantó ni dos semanas funcionando bien. No lo recomiendo. Mejor hacer la misma instalación comprando manguera y tubos en una ferretería aunque no se vea igual de estético.
